subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: A. J. Allmendinger, Champ Car's only American driver, edged his former teammate Justin Wilson by 5.420 seconds yesterday to win the Champ Car Grand Prix of Portland, Ore. Allmendinger's first series victory spoiled Sébastien Bourdais's bid for a fifth consecutive victory to open the season. Bourdais finished third. Allmendinger became the first American to win a Champ Car event since Ryan Hunter-Reay won at Milwaukee in 2004.
